resources.string: Sion is an app for installing files/scripts onto an android device,\nIts main aim is to be a user friendly way of doing this with the minimal chance of messing up your system etc.
Select what type of file you are installing from the Home screen.

If you select init.d Installer Click on the Choose Your Script Button, Navigate to your chosen file.zip and click it. The file path will be displayed Please check it, Then press the Install Chosen Init.d button. WAIT for the "install finished" text and make sure your happy with your choice before pressing the Reboot Your Device button as this will make the script take effect.

If you select Flashable.zip installer and click the Choose a Flashable.zip File Navigate to your chosen file.zip and click it. The file path will be displayed Please check it, Then press the Install Chosen .zip button, It takes about 20 seconds to copy the rom to the correct location and install the script so please be patient.
Please rate and review this app on the \nGoogle Play Store

Your device will reboot to recovery
then reboot back to your System.
for the script to take effect.
